system.description: You have learnt how to cast spells of a particular School of magic by sub-vocalising the incantations. If you cast a spell from that School, and your Casting Form does not include gestures, then any character who might want to respond to your casting (for example with a Counterspell) must make a Difficulty 2 Notice roll as a Free action to realise that you are casting a spell. This Talent can be taken multiple times for different Schools of Magic.
